logic_summary: Added V2 follow-up encounter based on section 13.5 Outcome, capturing the 6-month return visit, hearing aid management, and updated TFI/THI scores.

history.prior_management: Patient was provided a set of hearing aids that contained rudimentary tinnitus masking options (default setting included low-level masking noise).
history.present_illness: Patient returned for follow-up. Despite improvements in distress scores, he reported that many environmental sounds remained too loud, and pain was routinely produced by sounds that did not bother other people, particularly high-pitched sounds, horns, and sirens.

tests.name: Self-report scales
tests.key_findings: Clinically significant decreases in scores from initial administration.
